name: Paradigm: Phat Beatsies
description:
Paradigm: Phat Beatsies is a multiplayer, pixel-art, rhythm game based off of the critically acclaimed adventure game Paradigm. The game was made for PotLuck bootleg edition.

Controls are Z, X, N, M, and Enter.

This was created for fun as part of Perth’s Potluck games event. For information on the game that spawned this abomination check out Paradigm: 

https://www.paradigmadventure.com/
